_comment: Set VLLM_ENABLED=true to enable vLLM mode; default model is mistralai/Mistral-7B-Instruct-v0.3. Legacy Qwen2 adapters are archived.

synthesizer.notes: Uses ModelStore adapter mistral_synth_v1 by default; legacy Qwen2 adapters have been archived.

re_ranker.notes: Uses ModelStore adapter mistral_re_ranker_v1 by default; legacy Qwen2 adapters have been archived.

fact_checker.notes: Uses ModelStore adapter mistral_fact_checker_v1 by default; legacy Qwen2 adapters have been archived.

critic.notes: Uses ModelStore adapter mistral_critic_v1 by default; legacy Qwen2 adapters have been archived.

journalist.notes: Uses ModelStore adapter mistral_journalist_v1 by default; legacy Qwen2 adapters have been archived.

chief_editor.notes: Uses ModelStore adapter mistral_chief_editor_v1 by default; legacy Qwen2 adapters have been archived.

reasoning.notes: Uses ModelStore adapter mistral_reasoning_v1 by default; legacy Qwen2 adapters have been archived.

analyst.notes: Uses ModelStore adapter mistral_analyst_v1 by default; legacy Qwen2 adapters have been archived.
